home.aboutLine1: Are we a restaurant? Yes, we are!
home.aboutLine2: But above all, we are a team that works to bring you the best that the city of Setúbal has to offer: fresh and unique products, served with refinement and friendliness in an environment where you want to stay...and linger.
home.aboutLine3: New times imply change and we believe that Setúbal has much more than good grilled fish and fried cuttlefish.
home.aboutLine4: It has the soul of the Arrábida Mountains, the salty breeze of the Sado and the adventurous spirit of the fishermen who inspired us so much to want to be different.
home.menuItem1: Rooster Wrap with roasted Pineapple and Coconut Cabbage, Fresh Salad and Dijon mustard sauce
home.menuItem3: 1 drink (Still or sparkling water, Soft drink, Glass of wine, Beer 20cl)
